data.eml:eml: A new species of Lesteva Latreille (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Omaliinae) from Zhejiang, East China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ma, Wen-Li, Li, Li-Zhen (2012): A new species of Lesteva Latreille (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Omaliinae) from Zhejiang, East China. Zootaxa 3530: 74-76, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.210903
